game.name: DCS: L-39 Albatros - Kursant Campaign
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Captions available, VR Support, Partial Controller Support
game.shortDescription: The L-39 Albatros: Kursant Campaign is a single-player campaign for the L-39C/ZA aircraft. You will learning basic and advanced points:Low altitude navigation trainingLearning aerial reconnaissance using real-life tacticsDetailed instruction on bomb, rocket, and gun weapon delivery against ground ta
